name: Marketing with No Money - Printed Edition (posted within Australia)
description: Don't make the mistake of thinking you are in the business of sales, service or production the reality is, whether you like it or not, you’re in the business of marketing. That’s right – marketing. "Marketing with no money" the book teaches you how to implement simple free or cheap marketing strategies to build your business and brand.   The printed edition of "Marketing with No Money ...how to get your business the attention it deserves" has over 130 pages of easy to read and easy to understand marketing ideas.  Invest in you and your business for just $24.95 (postage free within Australia)
